info.name: ITmedia Article Width Changer
info.description:
ITmediaサイトの記事の幅固定を解除します。
This script enables the fixed width of articles to be adjusted accordingly to the browser size.
info.additionalInfo:
Tested Brower: Firefox 68esr + Stylus
Update 20200304: Renewal due to site design changes
Update 20200315: Hide sidebar when window size is small (some glitches remain)
